file_content.text: When it comes to the Gormak, the Voss aren't very understanding. They wouldn't even allow us to keep one for research here on the station.
The point is, be careful. When it comes to the Gormak, you never know.
I will keep that in mind, thank you.
I appreciate the advice.
Is that all?
My apologies. Yes, I am finished.
The Voss certainly are a strange people.
I don't understand the Voss.
You're telling me. But we'll have their allegiance by year's end, I think.
Good luck, my lord, and thank you for your time.
My lord. Rul Jophen, here. Imperial Diplomatic Service. Athelis Kallis tells me you're working with the Gormak.
Anything to stop them from shooting our people on sight, eh?
You didn't call me just to congratulate me on my choice of allies.
What's your point?
Ah, well, nothing gets by you does it?
I am only working with the one Gormak.
Don't get too hopeful.
Ah, well, even so.
I will put a good word in for you if I get the chance.
I'll see if I can help.
Well, yes, about that....
